name: Tank vs Missile
description:
For the Coding Blocks 2022 Game Jam I made Missile vs Tank.  This year for the The Coding Blocks 2023 Game Jam, theme Everything is backwards, I present ... Tank vs Missile.  Instead of you (the tank) running from the missile, the missile runs from you!

Move tank with keyboard arrow keys or WASD.  Click START button to restart.

Special thanks to:

  • My daughters ⭐ 🔔 for playing and giving some great feedback / ideas
  • https://kenney.nl/ for assets
  • https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/ for sound effects.
  • Music from #Uppbeat (free for Creators!): https://uppbeat.io/t/pecan-pie/robots License code: ENXLB0EJG5UNHZ18

Made with Unity 2021.3.16f1

Source code can be found here: https://github.com/davefollett/cb-2023-game-jam

(Note to self: the canvas scaler is needed to make the Canvas UI elements to show up.)

#cbjam
